description: Fit and toned Ernie is a romantic at heart. He works out five times a week to keep his body tight for the future Mr. Right. “In a relationship I would say I’m very loving and caring and shoot I like to be cuddled at night,” says Ernie. That’s not to say Ernie doesn’t have a naughty side. He tends to “go for the really good looking guys and they just do whatever they want honestly.” He continues saying that he loves “a strong and fit guy that can just pick me up and carry me.” Ernie’s not shy when it comes to describing his stand out features; “I would say that I have DSL. DSL stands for dick sucking lips.” “I like to bottom for a really hot guy, but when it comes to this I’ll be verse. But let’s be real, who doesn’t want to fuck this ass?”
title: Ernie
